name: Cannon Canines
description:
Cannon Canines is a 3D, minitank-driving, action-adventure game!
Play as one of the Cannon Canines, and join a crew of freedom-fighting animals in the Pawpad Isles in order to free your friends from a tyrannical megacorporation.

  • Play as an adorable dog!
  • Blow up your boss's stuff!
  • Build a tank out of garbage!
  • Hang out with weirdo rebels! Talk to a panda about coffee!

Speed through an explosive, bite-sized adventure and unlock new abilities! Pick up the wreckage of your enemies to build and equip new parts. Then, use their own machines to blow up their stuff!

There's lots of stuff that needs blasting, and you're the one who's going to blast it in Cannon Canines!
